Name: FC Load Disconnect
checklistText:
<size=21>FC Power Plant Check</size>FC Load Disconnect
		(Example using FC 2)

	a. Prior to Disconnect
		Ensure that at least one FC
			is powering each mn bus
		FC disconnect
		(1) Prime configuration

Panel 3:
			FC 2 MNA - OFF
			FC 2 MNB - OFF (verify)

			FC 2 MNA & B tb (2) - bp
		
			FC 1 MNA tb - gray

			FC 1 MNB tb  - bp

			FC 3 MNA tb - bp

			FC 3 MNB tb - gray
		

		(2) Sec configuration

			FC 1 MNB - on (up)
			FC 3 MNA - on (up)

			FC 2 MNA - OFF
			FC 2 MNB - OFF (verify)

Panel 1, 3, 122:
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) -
				on

Panel 2:
			FC BUS DISC lt - on (mom)

Pane 1, 3, 122:
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt - push,
				out

Panel 2:
			C/W lts (all) - out

Panel 3:
			FC 1 MNA & B tb (2) - gray

			FC 3 MNA & B tb (2) - gray

			FC 2 MNA & B tb (2) - bp

		
		b. Conn Desired FC to Desired Mn Bus
			FC to bus conn

			FC 2 MNA - on (up)



			FC 1 MNB - OFF
			FC 3 MNA - OFF

Panel 1, 3, 122:
		MASTER ALARM PB/LT (3) - on

Panel 2:
		FC BUS DISC lt - on (mom)

Panel 1, 3, 122:
		MASTER ALARM PB/LT - push,
			out

Panel 2:
		C/W lts (all) - out

Panel 3:
		FC 2 MNA tb - gray
		FC 2 MNB tb - bp


		FC 1 MNA tb - gray

		FC 1 MNB tb - bp

		FC 3 MNA tb - bp

		FC 3 MNB tb - gray
